name: Hero Survival Dinosaur Island
description:
Enjoy the real thrill of Dino shooter with Amazing 3D graphics and prehistoric jungle shooting park environment for free hunting game players. Find & Hunt different wild dinosaurs by showing your hunting skills in this Hero dinosaur survival game. play as hero survivor walking in a dangerous and huge jungle rain-forest full of dangers in which your mission is to stay alive in this Hero Survival Dinosaur Island. The wilderness is filled with deadly killer dinosaurs. play as a superhero dinosaur shooter in Hero Dinosaur Survival game which includes action-packed missions to hunt different dino in survival island with one of the best assault guns with you. In this exciting dinosaur simulator game. Hunt them before they hunt you and this is time to show your hunting skills. In the most deadly environment, you have to kill a specific amount of evil killer dinosaurs within a limited time. Drive crazy jeep and find your prey in the jungle to hunt different types of dino with assault shooting gun. In this dangerous and breathtaking environment survival is not easy, Hunt all giant dinosaurs from herbivores to carnivores. Show your hunting skills by shooting & killing dinosaurs with this action & simulator game. Kill them in lush and dangerous environments like the deadly shores untouched evergreen jungle and park. An ultimate game for simulator games animal lovers! Hunt with bow & arrow to kill big creatures trex. Find and hunt different evil dinosaurs like Tyrannosaurus, Spinosaurus​, carnotaurus & velociraptor. Shoot with one of the best assault rifles with you. Real dino will attack with full anger so as a hero hunter take your revenge. Hunter has to defend & survive in this evil dinosaur fighting game.

Hunt them before they hunt you in survival island. Kill all evil dinosaurs with your marvelous hunting skills. In the most deadly environment, you have to kill a specific amount of evil killer dinosaurs within a limited time. You have to show your hunting skills at every level otherwise you will be hunt by deadly dino. You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill this dino. Shoot like a pro with machine gun & assault rifle. They are the deadliest creatures on earth. If you'll survive in a fight thanks to your battle skills of the assassin. Craft your way to the full weapons armory to have a choice of weapons and to increase your chances of survival in this simulator game. Big dinosaur animals will have a dinosaur rampage, chase and attack the enemy, which is located on their territory. They can hear your noise. And they'll be quick, deadly and ruthless to you. This outstanding high-end shooting game gives you the wonderful opportunity to explore and dive into the impressive hero survival dinosaur Island adventure, has a great land, full of different dinosaur species. Having a choice of weapons arsenal, your chances of survival increase. Experience your driving skills by jeep driving and parking to survive in this action game.

Features of Hero Survival Dinosaur Island:

• Astonishing 3D graphics and amazing immersive gameplay
• Multiple Dinosaurs like tyrannosaurus & Much More
• Amazing 3D jungle & park environment
• Hunt real dinosaur with bow & arrow
• Gorgeous overgrown jungle map
• Thrilling and challenging Missions
• Smart and smooth assault gun
• Hunt and gather your weapons
• Angry T-rex out there to hunt
• Best Dinosaur game
